name: Cornell
description: Cornell is a privately endowed research university and a partner of the State University of New York. As the federal land-grant institution in New York State, we have a responsibility—unique within the Ivy League—to make contributions in all fields of knowledge in a manner that prioritizes public engagement to help improve the quality of life in our state, the nation, the world
features: Cornell offers nearly 80 formal major fields, listed below, as well as challenging dual-degree programs and a score of interdisciplinary majors that cross traditional departmental boundaries.

From the laboratory bench to the hospital bedside and from cultural evolution to concepts in sustainability, our researchers and scholars are translating discovery into meaningful, measurable impact that is changing the world for the better.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: More than 150 years of excellence in education, research and public engagement have given Cornell a unique history that is rich with innovation and tradition.
ShortDescription: Learning. Discovery. Engagement. Join the #Cornell conversation.
enhanced_description: Cornell is a distinguished research university, a federal land-grant institution, and an Ivy League partner, known for over 150 years of excellence in education, research, and public engagement. Positioned within the Learning and Development category, Cornell offers a vast array of nearly 80 formal major fields, challenging dual-degree programs, and interdisciplinary studies. Its researchers and scholars are dedicated to translating discovery into meaningful, measurable impact, contributing to accelerated skill development and enhanced learning efficiency across diverse fields of knowledge.
key_use_cases: Improving learning efficiency and speed for individuals and organizations
Delivering diverse training methodologies, including interdisciplinary and dual-degree programs
Facilitating continuous learning and knowledge retention
Leveraging academic research and scholarship for practical, impactful learning outcomes
competitive_advantages: Status as a federal land-grant institution, unique within the Ivy League
Over 150 years of established excellence, innovation, and tradition in education and research
Broad and deep academic offerings, including nearly 80 major fields, dual-degree, and interdisciplinary programs
Strong emphasis on research that translates discovery into meaningful, measurable impact
Prioritization of public engagement in all fields of knowledge
primary_users: Learning and Development (L&D) professionals (seeking external providers)
